description: This file contains the implementation of a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Note objects in an Android application. It manages creating view holders, binding note data to views, and handling click events on each note item.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView.Adapter subclass that provides views for Note objects in a list, handling creation, binding, and user interactions.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: A RecyclerView.ViewHolder subclass that holds references to the views in each note item layout.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new NoteViewHolder object by inflating the item_note layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds note data to the view holder, setting title and timestamp, and attaches click listeners.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of notes in the list.

methods.name: setNotes
methods.description: Replaces the current list of notes and notifies the adapter of data changes.
